Carbon Monoxide: 10 mg/m3 as a maximum daily running 8 hour mean
Nitrogen Dioxide: 200 ug/m3 as a 1 hour mean, not to be exceeded more than 18 times a year
Ozone: 100 ug/m3 as an 8 hour mean, not to be exceeded more than 10 times a year
Sulphur Dioxide: 125 ug/m3 as a 24 hour mean, not to be exceeded more than 3 times a year
266 ug/m3 as a 15 minute mean, not to be exceeded more than 35 times a year
350 ug/m3 as a 1 hour mean, not to be exceeded more than 24 times a year
